content: नायक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नी-ण्वुल्] Guiding, leading, conducting. --कः {@--1@} A guide, leader, conductor. {@--2@} A chief, master, head, lord. {@--3@} A pre-eminent or principal person, distinguished personage; सैन्यनायकः &c. {@--4@} A general, commander. {@--5@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) The hero of a poetic composition (a play or drama); (according to <ls>S. D.</ls> there are four main kinds of नायकः --धीरोदात्त, धीरोद्धत, धीरललित, and धीरप्रशांत, q. <ab>q. v.</ab> v; these are again subdivided, the total number of kinds being 48; see <ls>S. D. 64-75.</ls> The <ls>Rasamañjarī</ls> mentions {3} classes पति, उपपति and वैशिक; <ls n="Ras. M.">95. 110</ls>). {@--6@} The central gem of a neck. lace. {@--7@} A paradigm or leading example; दशैते स्त्रीषु नायकाः. {@--8@} An epithet of Śākyamuni.
